Gems of Old England
Misterton, Nottinghamshire Prizes - 1st £12 and cup, 2nd 7, 3rd £4, 4th £2. March contest(own choice) - 1st£1.10s.) Bullcroft, 2nd(£1) Hickleton Main. 6 bands competed.
